OOC- Sorry!  I refrain from doing that again.

shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...> wrote:OOC::
Hey Malice, what the moding.  How can she transform into beast mode 
and carry an electromagnet?  no wolf can carry something like that. 
So please, just make sure you don't make my char do too much without 
my say so. OK, thanks bro.

IC:  
Wolfblade:
She followed Malice as best as she could.  Once she reached the base, 
she heard the intruder alarm and transformed into wolf mode and ran 
to were the alarm was sounding. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice rummaged through some other compartments and found an energy 
storage unit.
> "I can absorb and refine enough energon and put it in here."
> He took the generator and energon storage and placed them in spare 
part compartments on his person.  He motioned for he to get out.  he 
followed and re- armed his traps.  The duo returne to beast mode and 
returned to the base.  A megacycle later, they returned to hear about 
a Predacon intruder.  They transformed and rushed inside.
